Social Media Marketing Services Overview

Take Your Business to Another Level with Social Media Marketing

In today’s competitive business environment, if you are finding it hard to stay on top of your competitors, it is a clear sign that it’s time to level up your marketing efforts. If you have tried all conventional marketing tactics and still don’t see the desired outcomes, social media could be a valuable investment in all aspects of the business.

This is particularly true as the world’s 59% population has become online now. Whether you are a marketer or a business owner, you can’t ignore leveraging the power of social media to give your business a head start.

Social media is comprised of a network of more than 3.5 billion people who find it an excellent way to create, find, and share information on the internet.

At RankON Technologies, we believe that it’s high time you should make social media marketing an indispensable part of your consolidated marketing bucket. Backed by years of expertise in powering up business digitally, we promise avant-garde social media marketing services.

Being a top-notch social media marketing agency, RankON can provide end-to-end social media marketing support to businesses of all types and sizes including startups, small and medium businesses, and multinational enterprises.

Consult us today and let us help you exploit the power of social media to award unmatched brand exposure.

What Is Social Media Marketing?

It is often said in marketing that the best way to market your products & services is to be at a place where your potential customers are-at present, it is social media. With nearly 58% of the world’s population being active on social media, indeed social media marketing has become the need of the hour.

Social Media Marketing is defined as:

“The process of utilizing social media websites and networks to promote a company’s products or services.”

A more refined version is here:

“Social media marketing involves the creation of customized content for each social media platform to fuel engagement and promote your business.”

Another reason why social media marketing has become immensely important as the daily average time spent by a user is around 2.5 hours.

Social media platforms allow businesses to establish a personal connection with their existing and probable customers. It is more like a wonderful opportunity for brands to present themselves beautifully, which eventually leads to tremendous business growth.

You can consider it as a situation where you meet a person for the first time. You would surely try everything possible to leave a lasting impression. Social media is just like that. You meet people virtually to leave an impression. Social media marketing helps in doing just that. But when it comes to creating content that is compelling enough to engage the audience, things are not easy. This is where choosing a reputed social media marketing agency like RankON is important to edge up creativity and increase your business exposure.

Our social media marketing experts understand all aspects of social media marketing and carve out a full-proof social media marketing strategy to power up your campaign.

Our Social Media Services Include

When you decide to hire us for social media marketing services, our domain experts can help you determine the most appropriate social media platforms for your business and offered products. We are fully capable of launching, monitoring and managing social media advertising campaigns including:

Facebook Advertising

When it comes to ensuring optimum audience interaction, Facebook advertising campaigns enable marketers to highlight both text and images during the ad campaign. You can target your audience based on their personal preferences, location, and topography, as well as the amount you want to pay per click or per mille (cost per 1000 impressions). Facebook has nearly 900 million users who put in more than 700 billion minutes every month.

Facebook Advertising Services

YouTube Advertising

YouTube has a great audience over any cable network and is considered the second most popular search engine. A YouTube marketing campaign allows marketers to focus on their target audience, unlike when you advertise on television. Furthermore, advertising on YouTube is as simple as linking your AdWords account.

YouTube Advertising Services

Twitter Advertising

Twitter lets you specify the goal of your business marketing campaign, such as Twitter engagements (likes retweets, and, replies), website clicks, app installs or engagements, followers, or even leads, and it only costs you when the activity you requested happens. Twitter also allows for a daily budget limit and a maximum cost per action.

Twitter Advertising Services

LinkedIn Advertising

Our LinkedIn advertising services target B2B customers specifically. LinkedIn members are responsible for around four out of every five company decisions, and they have two times the purchasing power of other social media sites. LinkedIn Ads come with two payment choices: cost per click and cost per thousand impressions (cost per mile).

LinkedIn Advertising Services

How Important Are Social Media Marketing Services In Today’s Scenario?

In today’s fast-paced environment, people love to visit the social media channels of brands and businesses to discover more about them. This gives them an  understanding of what others are talking about the brand.

So, if a potential customer searches for you on social media, let’s say Facebook and you are not there, it would be a big mistake. You end up losing big outcomes down the line.

For your reference, here are some startling facts that emphasize the need for social media marketing for businesses in 2022.

  • 71% of consumers who have had a great social media encounter with a brand are likely to tell their friends and family about it.
  • Active social media users include 90.4 percent of Millennials, 77.5 percent of Generation X, and 48.2 percent of Baby Boomers.
  • Facebook has 2.7 billion monthly active users alone.

When you know your target audience is there on social media and your business doesn’t have a remarkable presence, you are poised to stay behind in the competition.

Brands wishing to learn more about their customers’ interests and preferences could use social media. Smart businesses, according to experts, will continue to invest in social media to achieve long-term commercial growth.

Whether you’re launching a new product or a company, social media is an excellent way to get the word out about your efforts. As we progress farther into the future of e-commerce, it becomes evident that social media marketing is no longer merely a choice.

Your company can’t afford to ignore social media in this increasingly competitive climate.

It’s especially tough in the social media influencer industry, where thousands of new influencers launch businesses every day.

How Should You Start Using Social Media Marketing Services For Your Business?

In today’s corporate world, social media marketing – the act of increasing website traffic, customer engagement, and sales through social networking sites – is no longer a luxury, but a need. With billions of active users on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn, Tiktok, and Pinterest, marketers can’t afford to ignore these and other sites. Even though they are free and simple to use, social media platforms do not ensure the success of your marketing efforts. Unfortunately, many marketers place a premium on quantity above quality, never optimizing network engagement. Marketers risk falling behind on converting warm leads into customers if they don’t have a clear strategy and an action plan to engage their networks. For your reference, here are the five crucial components of social media marketing that should be considered while rolling out a social media marketing campaign.

Determine Your Business And Social Media Marketing Goals

Identifying defined business goals and marketing objectives is the first stage in any social media marketing campaign. What does your marketing plan aim to achieve? Do you want to offer items and services directly, increase traffic to your website, or increase brand engagement? These are the kinds of inquiries that marketers should ask right away. Finally, your marketing objectives should be defined, measurable, time-bound, and, most importantly, linked to your overall business objectives.

Recognize And Reach Your Target Market

Social media is an extremely powerful asset as it allows businesses to promote their products and services to their ideal customers.. Before the Internet, businesses had to pay large sums of money to market research organizations and advertising agencies just to figure out what their customers wanted. That information is now nearly instantly available with only a few keywords. Tools like Google Analytics, Social Mention, and Delicious can help you keep track of who is mentioning your company’s keywords. Use fields that gather crucial information about your potential customer when constructing forms on your website. This will assist you in identifying the proper people to add to your social network.

Industry Research

Even though social media marketing is still relatively new, marketing teams do not need to reinvent the wheel to succeed. If you’re considering using social media to promote your business, you’re probably not the first in your field to do so. Keep an eye on what your competitors are doing. This involves looking at their content strategy, posting frequency, and material kind. This can help you figure out what’s working and what’s not.

Social Media Platform Selection

Marketing to niche social networks may be more successful for businesses aiming to promote unusual products or specialized services. Consumer preferences must also be understood. Most businesses will almost certainly have a presence on all of the major social media platforms.
Marketers should consider establishing mission statements for each profile and starting from the bottom up in this situation. This simplifies profile optimization for SEO and cross-promotion.

Prepare A Content Strategy

You won’t get very far if your purpose is to just assault your network with regular posts and updates. In the world of social media, post fatigue is a very real phenomenon, and even your most devoted consumer may contemplate unfollowing you if you post too frequently. Regular updates are necessary, but the line between active interaction and spam must be drawn carefully. In the end, business is all about creating value, and social media is no exception. Social media should drive content, not the other way around. If you’re not posting anything relevant to your target market, don’t bother. Social media marketing does not have to be complicated, and active involvement does not have to elude you, provided you use common sense, patience, and persistence. The best place to begin is to have a thorough grasp of the platforms that your ideal/potential clients utilize, and then devise a strategy for gaining their attention. Keep in mind that your company’s social media platform is an extension of the firm. That means everything you share on social media should be consistent with your brand.

Is There Any Relation Between Search And Social Media Marketing?

Though it may surprise many, one interesting thing about social media marketing is that it is closely related to search engines. This makes it crucial for businesses and searches marketers to have a thorough knowledge of it.

Whenever a search is made on Google about your products or services, social media helps in the easier discovery of the relevant content in the form of news and stories. In addition, the links published on social media platforms provide link-building support to search engine optimization efforts.

In some cases, people search for specific terms on social media so this makes publishing relevant and quality content on social media a great idea for businesses.

What Are The Most Popular Social Media Platforms?

Over the years, several social media platforms are known to help businesses target different audience segments remarkably.

If you are looking to launch a social media marketing campaign, you must know these platforms. This would help you in determining the most appropriate social media platform for your campaign.

These social media platforms are meant to help advertisers in targeting different types of audiences that may include boomers, millennials, teens, professionals, females, and businesses.

For example, LinkedIn has become an extremely popular social media platform that focuses on professionals across several industries.

How do Social Media Marketing Services Benefit Businesses Today?

Whether you are a start-up, a small & medium enterprise, or a multi-national company, social media marketing has tremendous capability to add value to your business. However, for that, you need to choose a smartly prepared social media strategy. Various research works reveal that by doing precisely targeted social media marketing, publishing relevant and engaging content, and managing social media campaigns intelligently, brands can achieve high-quality traffic, improved search performance, better customer engagement, and most importantly unmatched brand loyalty. For your reference, here are some of the big benefits of choosing social media marketing.

Better SEO Rankings

Various studies have proved that search engines like Google give weightage to the social media presence of brands while awarding rankings. Search engines keep a close watch on the social interactions happening around the brand.

Precise Targeting

Fortunately, social media marketing helps brands and marketers in reaching out to the right audience at the right time and in the right manner. In most cases, they can choose from a range of parameters regarding audience selection like region, age, digital preferences, and several others.

Improved Exposure

When a brand enjoys a great presence on leading social media platforms like Facebook, LinkedIn, and Instagram, it is bound to get more exposure. However, to make it happen, it is necessary to have a solid social media marketing strategy in place that can increase the likelihood of getting better results in terms of augmented exposure.

Better Trust Among Competitors

It is not a surprise that an established social media presence helps brands fuel thought leadership and make result-oriented connections with the audience. Being a reputed social media marketing agency, RankON can help create insight-driven content that can help in instigating meaningful conversations with audiences.

Better Market Research

In recent times, more than half of the people use social media to do product research. It means that brands can grab better opportunities by showcasing their products in a much more engaging and remarkable fashion. However, make sure you are backed by a great social media marketing strategy that can promote brand awareness and highlight your offerings to the intended audience.

Better Profits

Small businesses and big corporations can seek gains from social media marketing because it is a low-cost strategy to reach out to their ideal customers. You can promote your products and services for free on various social media networks. At RankON, our social media marketing services are directed towards improving your brand awareness and getting more people talking about your brand.

Are Social Media Management And Social Media Advertising The Same?

No, they are not the same. In simple terms, any unpaid social media activity that you do comes under the purview of social media marketing. Some of these actions may be posting a blog, scheduling an organic post, responding to a user’s comment, or posting any content organically. On the other hand, any paid activity on social media is included as a part of social media advertising.

For most of us, finding the difference between social media marketing and social media advertising might be confusing since they are quite interchangeable. It’s important to understand the difference between social media marketing and social media advertising so you can incorporate both into your overall digital strategy.

What Does Social Media Advertising Mean?

Level up your social media efforts with RankON Technologies

How Do Social Media Marketing Services Help In Brand Building?

You may market your company to thousands of people all over the world via social media at any time. Your brand’s ability to reach any demographic, location or type of consumer is limitless. Your reach expands every time someone shares one of your social media posts.

Customers will be able to find and connect with you more easily if you have a social media presence. This will aid in increasing client retention and loyalty. Because one of the major objectives of every business is to build a loyal consumer base, social media should be part of your strategy.

Customer satisfaction and brand loyalty usually go hand in hand. Social media may be utilized for more than just introducing your goods; it can also be used to promote them. Customers regard these as service channels through which they can contact directly with the company.

At RankON Technologies, we believe that social media marketing enables two-way communication which initiates discussions between a brand and its target audience. We strive to empower this communication by giving a creative voice to brands across different platforms.

As more people search for products and services on social media, our social media marketing services help brands strengthen their social media footprints by putting in both organic and paid efforts.

What Does A Social Media Marketing Company Do?

Since the primary task of any social media marketing campaign is to look after the day-to-day social media activities of a brand or business, a social media marketing agency employs a team of professionals, tools, and insights to drive remarkable outcomes.

A social media agency’s first and foremost is to assist you to find and engage with your target audience while also providing demonstrable outcomes. A social media agency can help with three main services to do this.

Social Media Management

A social media agency will work with you to determine who your target audience is, which social media channels are appropriate for your needs, and how to develop high-quality material that can be shared on a regular basis. Expect your firm to design engaging content calendars and manage the scheduling and delivery of your content using social media management tools at optimal times.

Social Media Advertising

Paid social advertising can be used by a social media agency to enhance your organic efforts. Paid social advertising allows you to target specific segments or demographics to get your message in front of the right people. A sponsored social agency may offer different networks for different aims depending on your target and KPIs. A social advertising agency will associate with your business to come up with a social media advertising strategy that will deliver the intended outcomes, be it related to increasing sales, web traffic, or brand awareness.

Social Media Strategy & Reporting

When it comes to reporting and ongoing strategy, social agencies typically focus on the following measurables:

  • Ad effectiveness for your target audience
  • Accumulated sales, leads, or prospects
  • Cost per lead or per outcome

These analytics can often help you figure out if a social network is a suitable fit for you if you’re targeting the proper demographic, and if your ad spending is effective.

Difference Between Social Media Management And Social Media Marketing Services

Not only do these tools enable digital marketers to create and schedule content, but they also provide insights about the performance of the page which can be used to upgrade the strategy at any point in time.

Considering the rapid expansion of social media in people’s lives, it has become more than necessary for brands to make it an indispensable part of their primary business marketing efforts. It can help them gain a competitive edge.

Social Media Advertising And Google Ads Services – Which One Should You Choose For Your Business?

When it comes to giving a solid push to a brand’s marketing efforts, social media advertising and Google ads services emerge as marketers’ first and foremost choices.

Though both aim to drive conversions to a business, sometimes it becomes difficult for a layman to decide between them. So, let’s get to know them below with their distinctive features.

When It Is Best To Choose Social Media Advertising Services?

Social media advertising is found to work well if you are looking to increase your brand awareness. It gives more exposure to your brand by building a community and engaging with your target audience. The major focus of this kind of advertising remains on the upper ends of the funnel – consideration and awareness goals.

Some of the primary benefits of using social media advertising are:

Investing money in social media ads makes sense when you want to:

Brand Building & Awareness

Though you can’t drive everyone to buy your product or services, the target audience will become more aware of your presence in the segment. It is more like getting an opportunity to show what your brand is up to and when you can become the best choice for them.

Boost Engagement Rate

Social media advertising is a wonderful way to boost your audience engagement rate. Creating and posting insightful and relevant content can help grab your audience’s attention and encourage them to buy your product or service.

Know More About Your Target Audience

As social media allows brands to make a personal connection with the audience, brands have an opportunity to know more about the audience. This would help you curate your business marketing strategy by targeting them more precisely.

Increase Incoming Traffic

It has been already mentioned that social media advertising can help brands become more known among people. But, apart from this, by clicking on your ads, your audience will land on your website which would result in increased website traffic. This way, your potential customers can know more about your business, products, services, and more.

Create A Brand Community

Social media networks are an excellent way to grow your brand's community. Building a community for your brand may be beneficial depending on your sector. If you want to cultivate one of the most powerful communication channels – word-of-mouth – this strategy can help (WOM). Communities can play an important role in the development of your brand and the expansion of your business.

Empower Brand Constancy

Above everything else, social media advertisements can help you boost brand loyalty. Advertising on social media is a terrific approach to cultivating and establishing relationships with potential and existing clients, in addition to raising brand awareness.

When It Is Best To Choose Google Ads?

You can choose to invest in Google ads if you are looking to:

Get Leads

Though search engine optimization may take a longer time to get traction, highlighting your business and its offerings through Google ads is found to be a quick way of getting sales leads.

Target More Potential Customers

By posting your Google ads, you can highlight your business on avenues like Gmail, YouTube, and Google Display Networks. It simply means your ads would get a better audience reach.

Know Your Audience Deeply

Google advertising provides various insights into your target audience, such as the most commonly used keywords, localities, demographics, and other crucial data that can help you develop a more detailed picture of your target group.

Stay Competitive

By investing in Google ads, you can choose to gain a competitive edge on SERPs by enhancing set bids on their own.

The Verdict

According to digital marketing efforts, a good Digital marketing strategy should base on a hybrid model which includes both Google ads management and Social Media Advertising.

Ads on social media emerge as a wonderful option when it comes to increasing brand awareness. They are, however, less likely to assist you in gaining numerous conversions. On the other hand, your potential customers are more likely to click on your Google ad if they have already seen or heard about your brand.

As a result, social media ads and Google Ads frequently go hand in hand when it comes to smart advertising.

What are the big reasons to highlight my business on social media?

Investing in social media is not just a fad but there are several prominent reasons that make social media need of the hour for businesses. Some of these reasons are given below:

  • Augment brand awareness
  • Attain thought leadership
  • Personify your brand
  • Stay on the top of the competitive curve
  • Increase inbound traffic
  • Get leads
  • Increase sales
  • Online reputation management
What are the most popular social media platforms in 2022?

The top 10 social media platforms available today are:

  1. Facebook – 2.9 billion
  2. YouTube – 2.2 billion
  3. WhatsApp – 2 billion
  4. Instagram – 2 billion
  5. TikTok – 1 billion
  6. Snapchat – 538 million
  7. Pinterest – 444 million
  8. Reddit – 430 million
  9. LinkedIn – 250 million
  10. Twitter – 217 million
How can I schedule posts on social media platforms?

In the long term, creating a set of social posts and scheduling them ahead of time will save you a lot of time. The majority of social media marketing businesses utilize Facebook Business Manager to schedule all of their Facebook posts. TweetDeck is the most widely used program for everything that happens on Twitter.

Instagram posts can be planned using HootSuite, which also allows you to schedule posts on other social media platforms like as Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn. Because not all sites allow you to schedule photographs and videos ahead of time, posting to LinkedIn, Pinterest, Google+, and YouTube in real-time is suggested.

What is the difference between an organic post and paid ad on social platforms?

A post can be defined as a piece of text and image that you share on social media for your followers to see. An ad is a paid post that targets a demographic and interest-based audience outside of your following. Since most social media algorithms limit how many people view your company’s content naturally, promoting significant or relevant posts ensures that more people see them.

Another good sign that a post should be promoted is how well it performs organically. If it’s already doing well, throwing money behind it will expand its reach.

How frequently should I post on my social media pages?

In most circumstances, posting at least twice a week is a decent plan, although this isn’t true for all platforms. More frequent tweets and pins are required on Twitter and Pinterest, especially when there is more stuff to emphasize.

Utilizing Facebook, Snapchat, and Instagram Stories is another wonderful approach to stay top-of-mind. Because stories are only available for 24 hours, you can use them to create a sense of urgency and exclusivity without going overboard.

How much does it cost to choose social media marketing? What would be the ROI?

There is always an associated expense with social media marketing, whether you do it on your own or hire a social media marketing agency for the same. The foremost objective is to receive the most return on your investment of time, efforts, or money. It’s crucial to keep in mind, though, that ROI doesn’t always indicate profit.

It certainly can, but it may also refer to achieving other objectives like, increasing brand awareness, generating new leads, augmenting customer satisfaction, and sometimes growing email subscribers. The eventual outcome of your social media marketing efforts can be a direct result of how fixated it is.
